abstract: Brett Ratner, director of the Rush Hour films and comic-book blockbuster X-Men: The Last Stand, struggles to shed his reputation as a genre-hopping dilettante and a directorial gun for hire with his latest film, the caper-comedy thriller Tower Heist.
snippet: Brett Ratner directed the “Rush Hour” films and a new comedy, “Tower Heist,” with Ben Stiller and Eddie Murphy. But “X-Men” fans can’t forgive him.
lead_paragraph: Brett Ratner directed the “Rush Hour” films and a new comedy, “Tower Heist,” with Ben Stiller and Eddie Murphy. But “X-Men” fans can’t forgive him.

headline.main: Forget the Art House; He’s Making Blockbusters
headline.print_headline: Forget the Art House; He’s Making Blockbusters
